channel.title: Quinta da Rica-Fé
channel.description: Quinta da Rica-Fé is a large property surrounded by nature located in Bragança. In the property guests will find an old granite fountain dating back to 1742. Some rooms have a mountain view. Featuring central heating, rooms here will provide guests with a flat-screen TV. Free WiFi access is available. At Quinta da Rica-Fé guests will find free bikes, laundry, ironing and daily maid services. The property offers free parking on site and allows pets upon request.
